title: #99 - Justin Roiland & Alex Hirsch Charity Special 2018
description: On this VERY special episode of The H3 Podcast we are joined in the studio by Justin Roiland, Alex Hirsch, and Joey Salads to raise money for California Wildfire relief by means of Direct Relief- the Charity Navigator #1 rated charity in 2018! Over the course of 8 grueling hours we manage to raise over $100k while having an old fashion romp-riot along the way. There are prank calls to psychics, there are special requests from donators, there are phone calls with fans, there is drinking, there is a LOT of yelling, there is music, and SO. MUCH. MORE.
itunes:author: Ethan Klein
